name: Cubo vs Cubes
description:
THIS GAME  WAS MADE IN ONLY 2 DAYS .THERE MIGHT ME  MANY SHORTCOMINGS IN THIS GAME BUT THESE WILL  OVERCOME IN NEXT VERSION.

THIS GAME IS FPS SHOOTER RUNNER GAME .

THIS GAME IS FUN.

YOU  WILL ENJOY THIS AWESOME GAME.

CONTROLS

A:- MOVE  LEFT

D:- MOVE  RIGHT

R:- RELOAD GUN

MOUSE SCROLL WHEEL:- TO CHANGE WEAPON

IN THIS GAME YOU ARE  A CHARACTER NAMED CUBO .YOU HAVE TO SHOOT CUBES AND WIN POINTS.BUT DON'T TOUCH CUBES OTHERWISE YOU WILL DIE.

JUST REACH THE END BEING SAVED FORM CUBES.
